t: Mid America Pet Food
s: Headquartered in Mt. Pleasant, Texas, Mid America Pet Food (“Mid America” or the “Company”) is a leading pet food marketer and manufacturer of VICTOR® Super Premium Pet Food (“VICTOR”).

t: Mid America Pet Food LLC | Faithway Alliance
FDA and CDC Investigate Cases of Salmonella Linked to Pet Food Made by Mid America Pet Food; Multiple Brands Recalled | FDA
s: FDA, in collaboration with CDC and state partners, is investigating an outbreak of Salmonella Kiambu that is potentially associated with pet food made by Mid America Pet Food. The firm is recalling multiple brands including Victor, Eagle Mountain, Wayne Feeds + 2 varieties of Member’s Mark

t: Mid America Pet Food | PetfoodIndustry

t: Mid America Pet Food | LinkedIn
s: Mid America Pet Food has produced pet food in our own manufacturing facility since 2007. With a plant strategically located in East Texas, we are able to source a majority ingredients for many of our brands from ranches, farms and other trusted suppliers who are within a day’s drive of the plant.

t: Mid America Pet Food Expands Voluntary Recall to Include Additional Dog and Cat Food Products Due to Possible Salmonella Health Risk | FDA
s: Mid America Pet Food, Mount Pleasant, Texas, is expanding its October 30, 2023, voluntary recall to include additional pet food products, with Best By Dates before 10/31/24, made at its Mount Pleasant facility, due to the products’ potential to be contaminated with Salmonella.

t: Mid America Pet Food celebrates new $40 million facility | Pet Food Processing
s: May 11, 2023 - MOUNT PLEASANT, TEXAS — On May 9, Mid America Pet Food (MAPF) held a ribbon-cutting ceremony to celebrate the completion of its newest facility. The company invested $40 million in the project. The new facility was constructed to help MAPF meet increasing demand and to help sustain its strong growth. The company has grown considerably since its founding in 2007, expanding its offerings from the VICTOR Super Premium Pet brand ...

t: Mid America Pet Food acquires Nature’s Logic pet foods | PetfoodIndustry
s: Mid America Pet Food acquired Nature’s Logic premium pet products. Nature’s Logic focuses on the benefits of natural whole food nutrition. Nature’s Logic joins the Mid America Pet Food portfolio of brands, which includes VICTOR superpremium pet food.
